mapper.select: select count(board_free_id) from tbl_board_free where member_id = #{memberId}
select count(board_free_id) from tbl_board_free where business_id = #{businessId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board_free (member_id, business_id, board_free_title, board_free_content) values(#{memberId}, #{businessId}, #{boardFreeTitle}, #{boardFreeContent})
mapper.select: select board_free_id, member_id, business_id, board_free_title, board_free_content, board_free_register_date, board_free_update_date, board_free_like from tbl_board_free

select bf.board_free_id, m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_email, m.member_phone_number, member_status, b.business_id, b.business_email, business_ceo_name, b.business_phone_number, business_status, board_free_title, board_free_content, board_free_register_date, board_free_update_date, board_free_like, board_free_img_id, board_free_img_original_name, board_free_img_uuid, board_free_img_path, coalesce( ( select board_free_id from tbl_board_free where board_free_id < bf.board_free_id order by board_free_id desc limit 1 ), 0 ) as prev_board_id, coalesce( ( select board_free_id from tbl_board_free where board_free_id > bf.board_free_id order by board_free_id asc limit 1 ), 0 ) as next_board_id, ifnull((select count(reply_id) from tbl_free_reply where board_free_id = bf.board_free_id), 0) as reply_count from tbl_board_free bf left join tbl_board_free_img bfi on bf.board_free_id = bfi.board_free_id left join tbl_member m on bf.member_id = m.member_id left join tbl_business b on bf.business_id = b.business_id where bf.board_free_id = #{boardFreeId};

select board_free_id, bf.member_id, bf.business_id, board_free_title, board_free_content, board_free_register_date, board_free_update_date, ifnull((select count(free_like_id) from tbl_free_like where board_free_id = bf.board_free_id), 0) as board_free_like, (select member_name from tbl_member where member_id = bf.member_id) as member_name, (select business_ceo_name from tbl_business where business_id = bf.business_id) as business_ceo_name, ifnull((select count(reply_id) from tbl_free_reply where board_free_id = bf.board_free_id), 0) as reply_count from tbl_board_free bf order by board_free_id desc limit #{offset}, #{pageCount}

select board_free_id, m.member_id, b.business_id, m.member_name, b.business_ceo_name, board_free_title, board_free_content, board_free_register_date, board_free_update_date, board_free_like from tbl_board_free bf left join tbl_member m on bf.member_id = m.member_id left join tbl_business b on bf.business_id = b.business_id order by board_free_id desc limit #{adminCriteria.offset}, #{adminCriteria.rowCount}

select bf.board_free_id, m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_email, m.member_phone_number, member_status, b.business_id, b.business_email, business_ceo_name, b.business_phone_number, business_status, board_free_title, board_free_content, board_free_register_date, board_free_update_date, board_free_like, board_free_img_id, board_free_img_original_name, board_free_img_uuid, board_free_img_path from tbl_board_free bf left join tbl_board_free_img bfi on bf.board_free_id = bfi.board_free_id left join tbl_member m on bf.member_id = m.member_id left join tbl_business b on bf.business_id = b.business_id where bf.board_free_id = #{boardFreeId}
